ALWAYS READ THIS NFO PROPERLY
Join us now, see below for details

** Release Information **

Game Notes:

Ok, so here's the story. Not so far into the Future, a comet is careening
towards the Earth, but rather than obliterating all human life (which
would have made a rather short game), it instead passed close by and
littered the surface of the planet with meteorites. Then, research staff
who were assigned to examine the meteorites mysteriously stop responding
to communications, as do police and military units sent in to investigate
It's time for you, you lucky thing, as a member of an elite strike force
to go in there and sort it out

Game Features:

Missions range from your typical scientist rescue to taking alien-held
bases, as you attempt to reclaim the world from the slimy invaders. The
most appealing ingredient is the solidity of the world you interact with
The motion of the camera can be disconcerting to begin with, but it
gradually grows on you, and the fluidity of movement, weapon-firing
and sniper-functions truly draw you into the game

The graphics engine boasts directional lighting, dynamic color
illumination, volumetric fog, realistic water surfaces, and figures
comprising up to 1000 polygons, wrapped in a "stunning particle system
explosion system." In practice, it all looks very nice, although on this
mid-range system, there was a slight issue with the detail resolution
dropping off noticeably hard a few metres ahead of you!

More infos at http://www.venom3d.com

Install Notes:

Unrar, burn with CDRWin or Fireburner, install, copy crack play
